description.full: Get real-time stock quotes and share them in a conversation. Search by company name, share, or stocks.

commands.title: General
commands.description: Find number of stocks or listed equities using keywords, key ratios, index, and so on.

parameters.name: StockIndex
parameters.title: Stock Index
parameters.description: Name of index in which user wants to find stocks

parameters.name: NumberofStocks
parameters.title: Ranked Number of Stocks
parameters.description: Number of stocks in ranked order. Output format: Top:<Number of stocks or bottom:<Number of stocks>

parameters.name: P/B
parameters.title: Price to Book Ratio
parameters.description: P/B or Price to Book ratio of a stock. Output format: >x.xx or <x.xx

parameters.name: P/E
parameters.title: Price to Earnings Ratio
parameters.description: P/E or Price to Earnings ratio of a stock with comparison. Output format: >x.xx or <x.xx
